response.overview: Klair Hightower has spent years yearning to become a mother, and now with the adoption of a newborn on the horizon, her dream is finally within reach. Her trusted lawyer and secret lover guides her through the legal process, ensuring every detail is in place.  But just as the final papers are set to be signed, an unimaginable truth comes to light with Klair and the babyâ€™s birth mother. Abandoned at birth just years apart, their paths cross in a twist of fate neither could have foreseen. As they grapple with the weight of their discovery, Klair must decide what family truly means and whether love can bridge the gaps of a fractured past.
response.title: Invisible String
